name: The Little Astronaut
description:
The Little Astronaut is a game made for a school project. Within it you play as the little astronaut himself,  where you explore five abandoned space stations in search of the hidden "power stars."  The game utilizes an "on-rails" style of gameplay with the player being in control of making sure the little astronaut platforms over and through all the obstacles and pitfalls that the realm of deep space throws at him.

Credits

  • Fire

  • Star

  • Space pod + Mars ground
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/space/mars-pod-121710
  • Skybox
